shot.composition: Medium Shot, centered on the face and hands, rule of thirds respected
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Gimbal smooth motion, slight forward dolly of 0.5m over 4 seconds. Sequence 2 (4-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

physical.posture: Seated, slightly leaning forward, focused and calm

facial_features.hair: Light brown, tied in a loose bun, a few strands framing the face
facial_features.expression: Subtle smile, expression of well-being and satisfaction

wardrobe.top: Off-white linen robe, soft and natural texture

sequences.primary_motion: Delicate application of moisturizer on the right cheek, slow and sensory finger movement
sequences.camera_follows: Close tracking of the initial action

sequences.primary_motion: The subject continues the action with increased confidence and detail. Delicate application of moisturizer on the right cheek, slow and sensory finger movement evolves into a more complete demonstration, showing mastery and precision.
sequences.camera_follows: Medium shot capturing the full context and environment interaction

sequences.primary_motion: The subject completes the action with a satisfied expression, looks at the result with approval, and shows a subtle smile of accomplishment. Final moment captures the positive outcome.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on facial expression and final result, ending with a confident pose

scene.location: Modern and minimalist bathroom, spa ambiance

layout.width: Well-lit space, light wood countertop, white ceramic sink
layout.flooring: Large format tile in natural stone color
layout.walls: Textured white walls, wooden shelves with green plants (fern, eucalyptus)

scene.time_of_day: Morning (9:00 AM), soft and diffuse light

environment.background: Artistic blur (bokeh) on amber glass skincare bottles, a round mirror, and an organic cotton towel
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Soft natural light from a large side window (key light)
lighting.quality: Soft diffused, use of a large virtual softbox to soften shadows
lighting.color_temperature: 5600K (Daylight), slightly warmed to 5800K for a 'wellness' tone
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Neutral tones, soft greens, off-whites, and warm skin hues
color_grading.tone: Natural, fresh, bright and soothing (Natural Beauty/Lifestyle)

audio.ambient: Silence, light background sound of gently flowing water (indoor fountain or discreet faucet)
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-4s): Subtle sound of cream taken from the jar, light rubbing of fingers on skin. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Minimalist and relaxing ambient music, soft piano and airy synth pads. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, hyperrealistic quality
visual_rules.realism: Precise human anatomy and proportions with authentic facial expressions. Realistic skin details (pores, natural texture, micro-imperfections). Soft and flattering lighting simulating natural light. Smooth and biomechanically correct body movements.
visual_rules.continuity: Logical and credible progression of actions and movements. Consistency of lighting direction and quality throughout the sequence. Maintenance of skin tones, makeup, and hairstyle. Fluidity of facial expressions and body language.
